meta.title: Get Started - Find Your Perfect Brain Training Game
meta.description: Take our 2-minute cognitive assessment to discover personalized brain training games that match your goals. Start your journey to better focus and memory today.
meta.keywords: brain training assessment, cognitive test, personalized brain games, focus training, memory improvement, cognitive test online, free cognitive test, cognitive test example, focus training app, focus training exercises, cogmed working memory training, working memory test, working memory test free
meta.ogTitle: Start Your Brain Training Journey - Personalized Assessment
meta.ogDescription: Discover the perfect brain training games for you with our quick 2-minute assessment. Improve focus, memory, and cognitive abilities.

getStarted.title: Let's find your perfect brain game!

goalSetting.title: Where would you like to start?
goalSetting.subtitle: Don't worry, there's no wrong answer! Just pick what feels right for you:

focus.title: Improve my focus for work/study
focus.subtitle: Stay on task and reduce distractions

memory.title: Sharpen my memory for daily life
memory.subtitle: Remember names, tasks, and details better

general.title: Just looking for a fun mental challenge
general.subtitle: Brain games for the joy of it!

assessment.title: Quick Assessment
assessment.description: Here we will show 3 mini-games (placeholder content):

tests.focus: ‚Ä¢ Focus test (e.g.: click when you see green circle)
tests.memory: ‚Ä¢ Memory test (e.g.: click squares in sequence)
tests.reaction: ‚Ä¢ Reaction speed test (e.g.: click when it turns green)

assessment.placeholder: (Will be filled with actual mini-games later)

recommendation.title: Your Recommendation
recommendation.description: Here will be shown personalized recommendations based on your choices and test results.
recommendation.example: Example: We recommend you start your training journey with {gameName}!
recommendation.placeholder: (Future dynamic recommendations based on actual test results)

reasons.focus: Perfect entry-level game for focus training

descriptions.focus: Through visual search training, quickly improve attention concentration and anti-interference ability. It's the golden entry choice for focus training.
descriptions.memory: By memorizing and reproducing sequence patterns, effectively exercise working memory, widely used in cognitive enhancement training.
descriptions.speed: Accurately measure your reaction time, significantly improve brain processing speed and reaction agility through continuous practice.
descriptions.general: Combining visual and auditory dual challenges, comprehensively exercise brain multitasking capabilities, considered one of the most effective cognitive training methods.

focus.1: Rapidly improve visual attention and search abilities
focus.2: Significantly enhance reading speed and comprehension
focus.3: Increase sustained attention duration during work and study

memory.1: Effectively improve short-term and working memory capacity
memory.2: Enhance memory performance in daily life
memory.3: Build solid foundation for advanced cognitive training

speed.1: Accurately understand current reaction speed level
speed.2: Significantly improve processing speed through practice
speed.3: Enhance athletic performance and daily reaction abilities

general.3: Enjoy challenging and fun brain training

processingSpeedTest.title: Number Comparison Test
processingSpeedTest.subtitle: Test your processing speed
processingSpeedTest.instructions: Quickly select the larger number and complete as many comparisons as possible within the time limit.

reactionTimeTest.title: Reaction Speed Test
reactionTimeTest.subtitle: Test your reaction speed
reactionTimeTest.instructions: When the screen turns green, click immediately! Complete 3 rounds of testing.
reactionTimeTest.clickWhenGreen: Click immediately when the circle turns green

memoryTest.title: Sequence Memory Test
memoryTest.subtitle: Test your working memory
memoryTest.instructions: Watch the sequence of highlighted blocks, then click them in the same order
memoryTest.step1: Watch 6 blocks light up in sequence
memoryTest.step3: Click blocks in the same order
memoryTest.rememberSequence: Remember the order blocks light up...
memoryTest.excellentMemory: üéâ Excellent! You have strong working memory
memoryTest.goodMemory: üëç Good! Keep practicing to improve more
memoryTest.keepPracticing: üí™ Keep trying! Working memory can be trained

wordMemoryTest.title: Word Memory Test
wordMemoryTest.subtitle: Test your short-term memory
wordMemoryTest.instructions: Remember the words that will appear
wordMemoryTest.enterWords: Please enter the words you just saw
wordMemoryTest.hint: üí° Tip: No need to fill in original order, any order is fine

stroopTest.title: Cognitive Flexibility Test
stroopTest.subtitle: Test your attention control
stroopTest.instructions: When you see colored text, click the color of the text, not the meaning of the word
stroopTest.example: For example: When you see red-colored 'blue', click 'red'
stroopTest.useKeys: Use number keys 1-4 or click buttons

recommendations.dualNBack: Perfect for challenging your working memory limits
recommendations.stroopEffect: Great for improving cognitive speed and conflict resolution
recommendations.largerNumber: Ideal for basic processing speed training
recommendations.frogMemoryLeap: Fun memory training game to start with

performances.reactionSlow: reaction speed has room for improvement
performances.wordMemoryStrong: word memory ability is very strong
